title: Unable to Move/Control my Champion
body: I have been experiencing a glitch/bug, or something like that. In the game, I would lose control over my character for about a minute. I would have auto- attack off, but I would lose control, not be able to cast any spells, not move, and my Champion would auto- attack. I would also be able to watch it happen without any frame drops or lag, so this is not a lag issue. This bug would cause me to experience bullying of a kind (I would be called noob for running into a lane and dying), and defeats. This happens every few minutes, or whenever I try to attack or cast a spell. Also, sometimes I would also not be able to open the shop. I am really upset with this, and I think this may be an input bug. Or maybe it's because I play on a Mac? If you know a fix or answer for this, please tell me.

replies.body:
I could think of a few reasons that could cause your controls to become unresponsive.  The first might be a corrupted config that'sf ailing to respond to your input.  In that case, a config reset could fix it up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

If the issue persists, then run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to see if you might be experiencing a connection issue like packet loss.  In those cases, you can still have a great ping but instability could cause failure to deliver data to the game server properly.  Let me know!
